00040 BdkBatchMCStudy::BdkBatchMCStudy(const RooAbsPdf& model, const RooArgSet& observables,
00041                                  RooCmdArg arg1, RooCmdArg arg2,

00043                                  RooCmdArg arg6,RooCmdArg arg7,RooCmdArg arg8) :

00049 
00050 BdkBatchMCStudy::BdkBatchMCStudy(const RooAbsPdf& genModel, const RooAbsPdf& fitModel, 
00051                                  const RooArgSet& dependents, const char* genOptions, 
00052                                  const char* fitOptions, const RooDataSet* genProtoData, 
00053                                  const RooArgSet& projDeps) :
00054   RooMCStudy(genModel, fitModel, dependents, genOptions, fitOptions, genProtoData, projDeps),
00055   _onResPdf(0),
00056   _fitResults(0),
00057   _submitOption(""),
00058   _useRandomCP(kFALSE),
00059   _seed(0)
00060 {
00061   _genOptions = genOptions;   // this is not stored in base class
00062 }
00063 
00064 // Use "p" in fitOptions to only use the yields penalty term for fitting
00065 // Use "s" in fitOptions to only use the shape/Dalitz term for fitting
00066 // Use "x" in fitOptions to save additional information, see saveExtInfo()
00067 // Use "m" in fitOptions to skip the MINOS step
00068 BdkBatchMCStudy::BdkBatchMCStudy(const BdkPdfOnRes& genModel, const BdkPdfOnRes& fitModel, 
00069                                  const RooArgSet& dependents, const char* genOptions, 
00070                                  const char* fitOptions, const RooDataSet* genProtoData, 
00071                                  const RooArgSet& projDeps) :
00072   RooMCStudy(*((BdkPdfOnRes&)genModel).getPdf(), 
00073              *((BdkPdfOnRes&)fitModel).getPdf(), 
00074              dependents, genOptions, fitOptions, genProtoData, projDeps),
00075   _fitResults(0),
00076   _submitOption(""),
00077   _useRandomCP(kFALSE),
00078   _seed(0)
00079 {
00080   _genOptions = genOptions;
00081   _onResPdf = &((BdkPdfOnRes&)fitModel);
00082 
00083   // Delete objects created by RooMCStudy constructor
00084   delete _fitParams;
00085   delete _fitInitParams;
00086   delete _fitParData;
00087 
00088   // Initialize them correctly from floating parameters only
00089   _fitParams = new RooArgSet(((BdkPdfOnRes&)fitModel).parametersFree());
00090   _fitInitParams = (RooArgSet*) _fitParams->snapshot(kTRUE) ;
00091 
00092   // Add some additional variables
00093   _xyNllVar = new RooRealVar("xyNLL","-log(Likelihood)",0);
00094 
00095   // Put all in fit parameter dataset
00096   RooArgSet tmp(*_fitParams);
00097   tmp.add(*_nllVar);
00098   tmp.add(*_xyNllVar);
00099   tmp.setAttribAll("StoreError",kTRUE);
00100   tmp.setAttribAll("StoreAsymError",kTRUE) ;
00101   _fitParData = new RooDataSet("fitParData","Fit Parameters DataSet",tmp);
00102   tmp.setAttribAll("StoreError",kFALSE) ;
00103   tmp.setAttribAll("StoreAsymError",kFALSE) ;  
00104 }

00113 void BdkBatchMCStudy::generateBatch(const char* mcFile, Int_t nSamples, Int_t nEvtPerSample)
00114 {
00115   
00116   //  generate(nSamples, nEvtPerSample, kTRUE);
00117 
00118   TFile f(mcFile,"RECREATE");
00119 
00120   // Save the parameters used to generate the MC to the file  
00121   //  _genModel->getParameters(RooArgSet())->Write();
00122   
00123   // Save toy MC data to file
00124   
00125   RooAbsGenContext* genContext;
00126   if (_genModel->InheritsFrom(RooSimultaneous::Class()))
00127     genContext = new RooSimGenContext(*((RooSimultaneous*)_genModel),_dependents,_genProtoData);
00128   else
00129     genContext = new RooGenContext(*_genModel,_dependents,_genProtoData);
00130   
00131   for (int i=0; i<nSamples; i++) {
00132     //    genData(i)->Write();
00133     cout << "Generating MC sample "<<i<<endl;
00134     //RooDataSet *data = _genModel->generate(_dependents,*_genProtoData,nEvtPerSample);
00135     RooDataSet *data = genContext->generate(nEvtPerSample);
00136 
00137     data->Write();
00138     delete data;
00139   }
00140   f.Close();
00141   delete genContext;
00142 }

00144 
00145 Bool_t BdkBatchMCStudy::init(const char* mcFile)
00146 {
00147   _mcFile = mcFile;
00148   if (!mcFile) return kFALSE;
00149 
00150   TFile f(mcFile);
00151   if (f.IsZombie()) return kFALSE;
00152 
00153   // Read parameters used to generate the samples
00154   RooArgSet *genParams = (RooArgSet*)f.Get("parameters");
00155   if (!genParams) return kFALSE;
00156 
00157   // This is important for correct pulls
00158   _genParams = (RooArgSet*)genParams->snapshot(kFALSE);
00159 
00160   f.Close();
00161   return kTRUE;
00162 }
00163 
00164 
00165 TList* getDataSetKeys(TFile &f)
00166 {
00167   TList *mcList = new TList();
00168 
00169   // Make a list of all RooDataSet in the file
00170   TList *keyList = f.GetListOfKeys();
00171   TIter nextKey(keyList);
00172   while (TKey *key = (TKey*)nextKey()) {
00173     TString className(key->GetClassName());
00174     if (className!="RooDataSet") continue;   // no other objects
00175     mcList->Add(key->Clone());     // add the key to the list
00176   }
00177 
00178   return mcList;
00179 }
00180 
00181 Bool_t BdkBatchMCStudy::fitBatch(const char* fitFile, Int_t firstSample, Int_t nSamples)
00182 {
00183 
00184   if (_onResPdf) {
00185     cout << "BdkBatchMCStudy::fitBatch() not supported for BdkPdfOnRes."<<endl;
00186     return kFALSE;
00187   }
00188                   
00189   TFile f(_mcFile);
00190   if (f.IsZombie()) return kFALSE;
00191 
00192   TList *mcList = getDataSetKeys(f);
00193 
00194   if (nSamples<0) nSamples = mcList->GetEntries();
00195 
00196   // Now read the required RooDataSets from the file
00197   TList fitList;
00198   for (Int_t i=firstSample; i<firstSample+nSamples; i++) {
00199     fitList.Add(((TKey*)mcList->At(i))->ReadObj()->Clone());
00200   }
00201   f.Close();   // object are cloned so we don't need the file anymore
00202 
00203 
00204   // Fit the selected samples
00205   fit(nSamples, fitList);
00206 
00207   // Write fit results to file
00208   TFile f2(fitFile,"RECREATE");
00209   if (f2.IsZombie()) return kFALSE;
00210 
00211   fitParDataSet().Write();
00212   f2.Close();
00213 
00214   return kTRUE;
00215 }
00216 
00217 
00218 Bool_t BdkBatchMCStudy::generateAndFitBatch(const char* fitFile, Int_t nEvents, Int_t nSamples)
00219 {
00220   if (_seed==0) {
00221     // Set random seed to system time
00222     struct timeval tv;
00223     gettimeofday(&tv, 0);
00224     _seed = tv.tv_usec;
00225   }
00226   RooRandom::randomGenerator()->SetSeed(_seed);
00227   cout <<"Setting random seed to "<<_seed<<endl;
00228 
00229   // for RooAbsPdf we can use the base class function
00230   if (_onResPdf==0) generateAndFit(nSamples,nEvents,kFALSE);
00231 
00232   // for BdkPdfOnRes we need our own setup
00233   else {
00234     onResGenerateAndFit(nEvents, nSamples);
00235   }
00236 
00237   // Write fit results to file
00238   TFile f2(fitFile,"RECREATE");
00239   if (f2.IsZombie()) return kFALSE;
00240 
00241   fitParDataSet().Write();
00242   if (_fitResults) {
00243     for (int i=0; i<_fitResults->GetEntries(); i++)
00244       _fitResults->At(i)->Write();
00245   }
00246     
00247   f2.Close();
00248 
00249   return kTRUE;
00250 }

00253 // mostly copied from run() and fitSample() in RooMCStudy.cc
00254 // If nEvtPerSample<0 call BdkPdfOnRes::totalNumEvts() to get sample size
00255 Bool_t BdkBatchMCStudy::onResGenerateAndFit(Int_t nEvtPerSample, Int_t nSamples)
00256 {
00257   while(nSamples--) {
00258     
00259     cout << "BdkBatchMCStudy::run: "
00260          << "Generating and fitting sample " << nSamples << endl ;
00261     
00262     //
00263     // Generate sample
00264     //
00265     RooDataSet* genSample = 0;
00266     
00267     Int_t nEvt(nEvtPerSample) ;
00268         
00269     if (_randProto && _genProtoData && _genProtoData->numEntries()!=nEvt) {
00270       cout << "BdkBatchMCStudy: (Re)randomizing event order not supported." << endl;
00271       return kFALSE;
00272     }
00273 
00274     // Reset all fit parameters to their initial values  
00275     *_fitParams = *_fitInitParams ;
00276 
00277     // If requested, randomize CP parameters for each experiment
00278     // Pulls will be wrong in this case !!!
00279     if (_useRandomCP) setRandomCP();
00280     
00281     // Now, we can get the total number of events to generate if not specified
00282     if (nEvt<0) nEvt = (Int_t)round(_onResPdf->totalNumEvts());
00283     
00284     // For some reason we can't use the generator context.
00285     // Probably because the PDF gets re-created after useXXX() calls.
00286     //    genSample = _genContext->generate(nEvt) ;
00287 
00288     // Make sure we generate data for all variables
00289     _onResPdf->useDalitz();
00290     _onResPdf->useNnComb();
00291     _onResPdf->useNnCont();
00292     _onResPdf->useDE();
00293     _onResPdf->getPdf();
00294 
00295     // Use the PDF itself to generate
00296     gROOT->cd();
00297     //    _onResPdf->setNsigAsymFromXY();
00298 
00299     genSample = _onResPdf->generate(nEvt,_extendedGen);
00300 
00301     //    genSample->tree().SetScanField(0);
00302     //    genSample->Scan();
00303     
00304     //
00305     // Fit sample
00306     //
00307     
00308     if (_fitOptions.Contains("m")) _onResPdf->useMinos(false);
00309     else _onResPdf->useMinos();
00310 
00311     Bool_t usePenalty = kTRUE;
00312     Bool_t usePenaltyOnly = kFALSE;
00313     if (_fitOptions.Contains("p")) usePenaltyOnly = kTRUE;
00314     if (_fitOptions.Contains("s")) usePenalty = kFALSE;
00315 
00316     Bool_t fitOK = _onResPdf->fit(*genSample,usePenalty,usePenaltyOnly);
00317     if (fitOK) {
00318       if (_onResPdf->yieldFitResult()->status()==0 &&
00319           _onResPdf->xyFitResult()->status()==0) {
00320 
00321         // Store NLL's and fit parameters
00322         _nllVar->setVal(_onResPdf->yieldFitResult()->minNll());
00323         _xyNllVar->setVal(_onResPdf->xyFitResult()->minNll());
00324 
00325         RooArgSet tmp(*_fitParams);
00326         tmp.add(*_nllVar);
00327         tmp.add(*_xyNllVar);
00328 
00329         // Save additional information if requested
00330         if (_fitOptions.Contains("x")) saveExtInfo(tmp);
00331         else _fitParData->add(tmp);
00332       }
00333           
00334     }
00335     else cout << "Fit failed."<<endl;
00336 
00337     delete genSample ;
00338   }
00339 
00340   _canAddFitResults = kFALSE ;
00341   calcPulls() ;
00342   return kFALSE ;
00343 }
00344 
00345 
00346 void BdkBatchMCStudy::setRandomCP()
00347 {  
00348   if (_onResPdf->rhoPlus()) {    
00349     // Generate rB, gamma and delta
00350     _rB = RooRandom::randomGenerator()->Uniform(0, 0.4);
00351     _gamma = RooRandom::randomGenerator()->Uniform(0, 180);
00352     _delta = RooRandom::randomGenerator()->Uniform(-180, 180);
00353   
00354     // Set rho/theta parameters (gamma phase flip is done automatically)
00355     ((BdkPdfDKDalitz*)_onResPdf->sigGoodD0N().getDalitzPdf())->setCPparams(_rB, _gamma, _delta);
00356     ((BdkPdfDKDalitz*)_onResPdf->sigGoodD0P().getDalitzPdf())->setCPparams(_rB, _gamma, _delta);
00357   
00358     // Save these values for later storage
00359     _rhoPgen = _onResPdf->rhoPlus()->getVal();
00360     _rhoNgen = _onResPdf->rhoMinus()->getVal();
00361     _thetaPgen = _onResPdf->thetaPlus()->getVal();
00362     _thetaNgen = _onResPdf->thetaMinus()->getVal();
00363   }
00364   else {
00365     _xPgen = RooRandom::randomGenerator()->Uniform(-0.4, 0.4);
00366     _xNgen = RooRandom::randomGenerator()->Uniform(-0.4, 0.4);
00367     _yPgen = RooRandom::randomGenerator()->Uniform(-0.4, 0.4);
00368     _yNgen = RooRandom::randomGenerator()->Uniform(-0.4, 0.4);
00369                 
00370     _onResPdf->xPlus()->setVal(_xPgen);
00371     _onResPdf->xMinus()->setVal(_xNgen);
00372     _onResPdf->yPlus()->setVal(_yPgen);
00373     _onResPdf->yMinus()->setVal(_yNgen);
00374     cout << "BdkBatchMCStudy: Setting cartesian coordinates: "
00375          << "x+=" << _xPgen << ", "
00376          << "x-=" << _xNgen << ", "
00377          << "y+=" << _yPgen << ", "
00378          << "y-=" << _yNgen << endl;
00379       
00380   }
00381   _onResPdf->setNsigAsymFromXY();
00382 }

00384 
00385 // Save initial floating parameters and correlation matrix of x/y fit
00386 void BdkBatchMCStudy::saveExtInfo(const RooArgSet& parSet)
00387 {
00388   RooFitResult* r = _onResPdf->xyFitResult();
00389 
00390   // Store CP parameters used to generate data
00391   RooArgList* pars = new RooArgList(); // (RooArgList*)r->floatParsInit().snapshot(kTRUE);
00392 
00393   if (_onResPdf->rhoPlus()) {
00394     pars->addOwned(*(new RooRealVar("rhoPgen","rhoPgen",_rhoPgen)));
00395     pars->addOwned(*(new RooRealVar("rhoNgen","rhoNgen",_rhoNgen)));
00396     pars->addOwned(*(new RooRealVar("thetaPgen","thetaPgen",_thetaPgen)));
00397     pars->addOwned(*(new RooRealVar("thetaNgen","thetaNgen",_thetaNgen)));
00398   }
00399   else {
00400     pars->addOwned(*(new RooRealVar("xPgen","xPgen",_xPgen)));
00401     pars->addOwned(*(new RooRealVar("xNgen","xNgen",_xNgen)));
00402     pars->addOwned(*(new RooRealVar("yPgen","yPgen",_yPgen)));
00403     pars->addOwned(*(new RooRealVar("yNgen","yNgen",_yNgen)));
00404   }
00405   
00406   pars->addOwned(*(new RooRealVar("rB","rB",_rB)));
00407   pars->addOwned(*(new RooRealVar("gamma","gamma",_gamma)));
00408   pars->addOwned(*(new RooRealVar("delta","delta",_delta)));
00409     
00410   // Add covariance matrix
00411   TMatrix cov, cor;
00412   BdkMath::getCovCorMatrix(r, cov, cor);
00413 
00414   for (int i=0; i<cov.GetNcols(); i++) {
00415     for (int j=0; j<=i; j++) {
00416       TString name("cov_");
00417       name += i;
00418       name += j;
00419       RooRealVar* mij = new RooRealVar(name,name,cov(i,j));
00420       pars->addOwned(*mij);
00421     }
00422   }
00423   
00424   pars->setAttribAll("StoreError",kFALSE);
00425   pars->setAttribAll("StoreAsymError",kFALSE);
00426   
00427   // Add new columns if this is the first entry
00428   if (_fitParData->numEntries()==0) _fitParData->addColumns(*pars);
00429 
00430   // Add our parameters to existing ones
00431   RooArgSet tmp(parSet);
00432   tmp.add(*pars);
00433 
00434   // Save all parameters in dataset
00435   _fitParData->add(tmp);
00436 
00437   // Cleanup all RooAbsArgs created in this function
00438   delete pars;
00439 }

00441 
00442 // Convert a RooArgSet into its constructing string
00443 TString BdkBatchMCStudy::argSetToString(RooArgSet &set)
00444 {
00445   TString s = "RooArgSet(";
00446   TIterator *iter = set.createIterator();
00447   Bool_t firstArg = kTRUE;
00448   while (RooAbsArg *arg = (RooAbsArg*)iter->Next()) {
00449     if (!firstArg) s += ",";
00450     firstArg = kFALSE;
00451     s += arg->GetName();
00452   }
00453   s += ")";
00454   return s;
00455 }

00458 // create one fit script
00459 void BdkBatchMCStudy::writeScript(const char* mcFile, const char* fitFile, 
00460                                   const char* scriptFile,
00461                                   const char* setupScript,
00462                                   Int_t firstSample, Int_t nSamples, Int_t nEvents)
00463 {
00464   ofstream of;
00465   of.open(scriptFile);
00466 
00467   of <<"{"<<endl;
00468 
00469   // run init script
00470   of <<"gROOT->ProcessLine(\".x "<<setupScript<<"\");"<<endl;
00471 
00472   // create BdkBatchMCStudy object
00473   of <<"BdkBatchMCStudy *toyMC = new BdkBatchMCStudy("
00474      <<_genModel->GetName()<<","
00475      <<_fitModel->GetName()<<","
00476      <<argSetToString(_dependents);
00477 
00478   // generator, fit options
00479   of <<",\""<<_genOptions<<"\",\""<<_fitOptions<<"\",";
00480 
00481   // prototype dataset
00482   if (_genProtoData) of << _genProtoData->GetName();
00483   else of << "0";
00484 
00485   // RooArgSet of projDeps
00486   of << ","<<argSetToString(_projDeps);
00487 
00488   of <<");"<<endl;
00489 
00490   if (mcFile) {
00491     of << "toyMC->init(\""<<mcFile<<"\");"<<endl;
00492     of << "toyMC->fitBatch(\""<<fitFile<<"\","
00493        << firstSample <<","<<nSamples<<");"<<endl;
00494   }
00495   else {
00496     of << "toyMC->generateAndFitBatch(\""<<fitFile<<"\","
00497        << nEvents <<","<<nSamples<<");"<<endl;
00498   }
00499   of << "return 0;"<<endl;
00500   of << "}"<<endl;
00501 
00502   of.close();
00503 }
00504 
00505 // Create the batch scripts
00506 // Returns list of root files where the fit output will be stored
00507 // This list also gets written to "<fitFileBase>.files"
00508 vector<string> BdkBatchMCStudy::createScripts(const char* mcFile, 
00509                                               const char* fitFileBase,
00510                                               const char* setupScript,
00511                                               Int_t fitsPerJob,
00512                                               Int_t nSamples, Int_t nEvtPerSample)
00513 {
00514   vector<string> fileList;
00515 
00516   if (mcFile) {
00517     // open file with toy MC
00518     TFile f(mcFile);
00519     if (f.IsZombie()) return fileList;
00520 
00521     // get number of datasets in toy MC file
00522     TList *mcList = getDataSetKeys(f);
00523     f.Close();
00524     nSamples = mcList->GetEntries();
00525   }
00526 
00527   Int_t first = 0;
00528   Int_t job = 1;
00529   while (first<nSamples) {
00530 
00531     // File name of fit result
00532     TString fitFile = fitFileBase;
00533     fitFile += "-";
00534     fitFile += job;
00535 
00536     // File name of root script
00537     TString scriptFile = fitFile;
00538     scriptFile += ".cc";
00539     fitFile += ".root";
00540 
00541     // Write script for one job
00542     Int_t N = fitsPerJob;
00543     if (first+fitsPerJob>=nSamples) N = nSamples-first;
00544     cout << "Creating fit script "<<scriptFile<<endl;
00545     writeScript(mcFile,fitFile,scriptFile,setupScript,first,N,nEvtPerSample);
00546     
00547     // Put file in list and move next
00548     string s(fitFile);
00549     fileList.push_back(s);
00550     job++;
00551     first += fitsPerJob;
00552   }
00553 
00554   // Write the submit script
00555   ofstream submit;
00556   TString submitScript(fitFileBase);
00557   submitScript += "-sub";
00558   cout << "Creating submit script "<<submitScript<<endl;
00559   submit.open(submitScript);
00560 
00561   // Store the list of root files
00562   ofstream ofiles;
00563   TString ofilesPath(fitFileBase);
00564   ofilesPath += ".files";
00565   cout << "Creating file list "<<ofilesPath<<endl;
00566   ofiles.open(ofilesPath);
00567 
00568   for (Int_t i=0; i<fileList.size(); i++) {
00569     ofiles << fileList[i] << endl;
00570     TString logFile(fileList[i]);
00571     logFile.ReplaceAll(".root",".log");
00572     TString script(fileList[i]);
00573     script.ReplaceAll(".root",".cc");
00574     submit << "bsub "<<_submitOption<<" -o "<<logFile<<" bbrroot -q -b "<<script<<endl;
00575   }
00576   submit.close();
00577   ofiles.close();
00578 
00579   return fileList;
00580 }
